text: Vieste is a town and comune in the Province of Foggia in the Apulia region in southeast Italy. The town is on the eastern tip of the Gargano peninsula. It is within the Gargano National Park. The economy is based on agriculture and fishing. == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Official tourism website Category:Towns in Apulia Category:Settlements in Foggia
title: Vieste
